scenario_text.value: Kew! Kew!

Looks like Kunemon wants to welcome you back
too, Takuma.
Is that right? Thanks, Kunemon.
Kew!

It’s good you came back, but... 
Is Miyuki really the key?
Yeah. No doubt about it.

If you say so, I’ll believe it...
Real talk though, I seriously don’t get it.

We’re running around like maniacs just to
survive, then there’s this Miyuki business...

I can’t spare even an iota of energy on
trying to figure out a way back home.

(Ryo definitely seems calmer than before, but
he’s still super anxious.)

(And yet from what everyone says, he’s
definitely a helpful part of the team now.)

(It also sounds like he knows the deal with
Miyuki. Maybe I can get details from him?)
(What should I ask Ryo?)
What’s up with Miyuki?
What do you think?
Let’s brainstorm.
What’s up with Miyuki?
What’s the deal with Miyuki?
Sorry, man. I can’t really explain it well.

It’ll be faster if you see it for yourself.
Heck, you probably won’t get it till you do.
Ah, I got you...
What do you think?

What do you think about this “Miyuki is the
key” stuff, Ryo?

Huh? Well at the very least, that means we’re
screwed if we don’t save her, right?
So you’re not against the idea, like Kaito?
Yeah, that’s what I’m saying.

I mean, I get where the guy’s coming from...
but ain’t there some way to save her?

We still don’t know a damn thing about what
the deal is here.
Let’s brainstorm.

Let’s think it over together, man. First, we
need to find Miyuki. Then—

Dude... Ain’t you a ray of sunshine, given
you know diddly-squat about Miyuki’s sitch.
No, it’s just—

I know, I know. I’m not saying we should just
sit on our hands like a couple of slackers.

We gotta save the girl no matter what, yeah?
So we have to figure out how to do that.

Ryo... Can’t say I expected you to be so
on-board with this.

*cough* Uh, well... Maybe I wouldn’t have
been before, so I can’t blame ya.

If we gotta make it happen, then we’ll make
it happen. That’s all.
Yeah, let’s do it together!

Guess I’ll just have to do what I can based
on what you say.
...Heh, doesn’t sound like me, does it?
Not true, man. Thanks for trusting me.

Hey, knock that off.
It’s no big deal.
(So he says, but he looks pretty happy.)

(I’ve got to keep at it. People are putting
their faith in me!)

We gotta do it, don’t we? Then we might as
well do it quick.
